'''Bruno Bracegirdle''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Bruno was the son of [[Blanco Bracegirdle|Blanco]] and [[Primrose Boffin|Primrose]]. He had a younger sister, the infamous [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins]], and two children, [[Hugo Bracegirdle|Hugo]] and [[Hilda Bracegirdle|Hilda]].<ref name=Boffin>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>

Bruno attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref name=Boffin />
